title: Getting Wild Bug-splats During Game With A Full Team
body:
Hello Fellow Summoners And Riot Support Team. Me and my friends are having an issue with Bug Splats during games. For the past few days me and my friend's game freeze during our game, most of the time its just 4 of us that freeze and crash during out game our latest one was a game which i played Gragas Normal Draft Pick on the 30/09/17. I am wondering if anyone is encountering this problem. 


TM Player Out :{)

replies.body: Have you guys got discord overlays enabled? That seems to cause some crazy bugsplat issues.
